summary: A documentary filmmaker finds himself drawn into the seedy world of a snuff filmmaker with a mysterious dark side.
cast: Travis Schuldt|John Savage|Bronson Pinchot|Valery M. Ortiz|Conor Duffy|Natalie Zea|Carmen Palumbo|Carmen Mormino|Jeffrey T. Unterkofler|Cristen Irene|Nikki Flux|Elina Madison|Eric Michael Kochmer|Christopher Allen|Jennifer Pfalzgraff|Catherine Quantschnigg|Aimee Denaro|Sarmarie Klein
title: From a Place of Darkness
